text: I'm Matthias and this is my portfolio
I'm a Front-End developer from Stockholm. I'm passionate about making better www's, one website at a time. This site is for displaying some projects I have done and which I am particularly proud of.

After thinking about which my personal qualities are as a developer, I think I can summarize it as that I like challenges and to create something unique and user-friendly. I am driven to learn new things and take great pride in what I do I have tried to identify some keywords that show what I regularly work with and feel that I have mastered
